title: This PDF Expert subscription makes creating and editing PDFs a breeze, now just $39.99
content:
Macworld

Despite plenty of worthy competition, PDFs emerged as the dominant web document format all the way back in the ’90s. 

But no format is perfect. Despite its visual appeal and space efficiency, PDFs have always presented some challenges. Like how it’s often tough to edit PDFs and keep them working and looking attractive across various platforms and editors.

However, Mac users have a friend in PDF Expert, a go-to app for any user’s PDF needs. From simple viewing to advanced editing, this app offers versatility for effortlessly editing text and images, adding links, and utilizing helpful markup tools for annotations.

Along with all of its editing prowess, PDF Expert also excels in filling out interactive forms and converting existing PDFs into different formats. Armed with all those tools, it’s easy to share documents seamlessly across devices, even while providing essential security features like staunch password protection.

Meanwhile, your one-year subscription also includes PDF Expert’s killer AI Chat features, like creating document summaries in seconds, finding keywords and hashtags, or even just answering key questions about your particular document.

PDF Expert also boasts some prestigious awards, including Apple Editors’ Choice honors, locking it in as a solid market leader for anyone working with PDFs.

Right now, grab a one-year subscription to the PDF Expert Premium Plan for just $39.99, a 50% discount from the regular $79.99 price.
